mapper.insert: insert into test_oxygen (expid, id, timestamp, vo2, vco2) values (#{expid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{timestamp,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{vo2,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{vco2,jdbcType=DOUBLE})

( #{item.expid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.timestamp,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{item.vo2,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{item.vco2,jdbcType=DOUBLE} )
